price: Cuando sintieron que Mi tormento se desencadenaba sobre ellos, trataron de escapar.
arabic: فَلَمَّآ أَحَسُّواْ بَأۡسَنَآ إِذَا هُم مِّنۡهَا يَرۡكُضُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: falammā aḥassū basanā idhā hum min'hā yarkuḍūna
